contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 15 入职时间 Entry Time
玛丽在和面试官布朗先生商讨入职时间的问题。

contents.title: 布朗：我认为你是一个非常优秀的人，坦白来讲，你很适合这个工作。
contents.answer: I think you are an excellent person. Honestly speaking, you are very suitable for this job.

contents.title: 玛丽：很感谢你的好评，我也很喜欢这份工作。
contents.answer: Thank you very much for your evaluation. I also like this job very much.

contents.title: 布朗：我想知道你最快什么时间可以入职。
contents.answer: I want to know your earliest available entry time.

contents.title: 玛丽：哦，让我想想……或许两个月之后吧。
contents.answer: Oh, let me think…Maybe two months later.

contents.content: 在面试过程中，如果面试官提及入职时间的问题，一般求职者面试成功的几率会比较大。通常情况下，如果应聘单位觉得求职者不符合任职要求或是还需要进一步的考虑，一般是不会提及入职时间的。相反，如果是有意雇用你，会主动询问入职时间的。

contents.title: 布朗：太晚了。假如你能获得这份工作，你能早点报到吗？
contents.answer: It's too late. If you could get the job, could you start a little earlier?

contents.title: 玛丽：很抱歉，我不能，因为我还没有完成论文呢。
contents.answer: I'm sorry I can't, because I haven't finished my thesis.

contents.title: 布朗：真遗憾！
contents.answer: What a pity!

contents.title: 玛丽：你们一般要求新员工什么时候入职呢？
contents.answer: When do you usually require the new employee to start?

contents.title: 布朗：两周以后，因为我们需要对新员工进行入职培训。
contents.answer: Within two weeks, because the new employees need to receive induction training.

contents.title: 玛丽：那我再安排一下吧。
contents.answer: I will make an arrangement for it.

contents.content: 确定入职时间牵涉到多方面的问题。一般求职者在被确定录取后正式工作前，都会参加公司组织的入职培训或是岗前培训，以了解公司的情况和工作流程。因此，公司需要根据求职者的入职时间来具体安排相关事宜。

contents.title: 布朗：我希望你能来我们公司工作。
contents.answer: I hope you can come to our company to work.

contents.title: 玛丽：我会尽快给您一个确切的答复。
contents.answer: I will give you an exact reply as soon as possible.

contents.title: 布朗：好的，一周之内我会为你保留这个职务。
contents.answer: OK, I will keep this position for you for one week.

contents.title: 玛丽：非常感谢。
contents.answer: Thank you very much.

contents.content: 如果求职者在面试过程中各项进展顺利，感觉成功机率很大，也可主动向面试官询问入职时间，以表示出对公司的关注和重视，可能会给面试官留下不一样的印象。

contents.title: 1.我负责员工入职手续的办理。
contents.answer: I'm responsible for managing staff enrolling procedures.

contents.title: 2.你入职后，我们会对你进行入职培训。
contents.answer: We will give you induction training upon your entry.

contents.title: 3.你什么时间能入职？
contents.answer: When can you start working?

contents.title: 4.你有三个月的时间准备入职。
contents.answer: You have three months to prepare for the entry.

contents.title: 5.你能告诉我你最早的入职时间吗？
contents.answer: Can you tell me your earliest date of availability?

contents.title: 6.入职培训时，你会有工资。
contents.answer: You can get paid during the job training.

contents.title: 7.你能告诉我准确的入职时间吗？
contents.answer: Can you tell me your exact entry time?

contents.title: 8.希望你能考虑我的入职时间。
contents.answer: I hope you can consider my available entry time.

contents.title: 9.我们来谈一下你的入职时间吧。
contents.answer: Let's talk about your entry time.

contents.title: 10.入职时间是可以商量的。
contents.answer: The entry time can be negotiated.

contents.content: earliest available date 最快的入职时间
